Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/admin

../                      Parent directory
!INDEX.html              Long index format
accounts/                utils for manipulating user accounts
diskusage/               tools for monitoring disk usage and enforcing quotas
frontends/               visual and GUI front ends for system administration
idle/                    programs to display/kill idle or greedy users
isp/                     specialized administration tools for ISPs
log/                     utilities for clearing, rotating, and digesting system logs
login/                   tools for handling user logins
nis/                     NIS (Network Information System) support
su/                      utilities to allow selected users to run root programs
time/                    utils for maintaining the system time
MAKEDEV-2.2.tar.gz       script to make /dev files (can read /proc/devices)
MAKEDEV-C-1.6.1.tar.gz   program to make /dev files (can read /proc/devices)
admind-0.10-LD.tgz       universal time/traffic quota/reporting tool
admutil-1.18.tar.gz      basic administration utilities for Linux
bgcheck-0.3.tar.gz       a process monitor for Linux written in perl
fixperms.1.00.tar.gz     makes it easier to change file permissions
fsutil-1.8.tar.z         Src for fs independent frontend for mkfs and fsck
hostid.tar.gz            program to sethostid() for later query
instmon-1.5.tar.gz       shell script that monitors installations and detects files added or modified
monitor-1.0.tar.gz       Programs used by Superuser for administration
passdisable.gz           allow a lazy sysadmin to disable passwords from
queue-1.12-p2.tar.gz     load-balancing/batch-processing tool
rfiledist-0.90.tar.gz    remote file distribution system
rt-1.0.tar.gz            rt starts any program on realtime priority
satools-1.5.tar.gz       tools to help sys admins on large unix nets
shadow-971215.tar.gz     shadow password suite
shadow-ina-box-1.2.tgz   full collection of shadows utilities w/ programs
systool-1.0.tar.gz       system tools
zlister.taz              scripts for keeping filesytem listings
